EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Big Data Forum - Hong Kong Perspectives
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Friday 11th September 2015 Sheraton Hong Kong Hotel & Towers 20 Nathan Road Kowloon {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming Big Data Forum: Hong Kong Perspectives <http://www.pivotal.io/event/big-data-forum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=big-data-forum-q315>. AGENDA
1:45 PM - 2:00 PM Registration
2:00 PM - 2:40 PM Keynote - Big Data - Hong Kong Perspectives
2:40 PM - 3:20 PM Redefine the Company Pulse - Industry Perspective
3:20 PM - 3:40 PM Afternoon Tea
3:40 PM - 4:20 PM Big Data - Insight Perspective
4:20 PM - 5:30 PM Big Data Technologies - Innovation Perspective VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://www.pivotal.io/event/big-data-forum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=big-data-forum-q315>
